name: Tap Pirates
description:
Follow your path through big waves, tap to defeat your enemies and become almost a hero in the best free tapping game adventure over the sea.

If you enjoy clicker games, Tap Pirates will make you an addict of the tap tap games action!

A mesmerizing idle clicker RPG for all the family. Join this adventure and show them who’s the pirate titan!

We promise you’ll ENJOY this RPG experience

Play your role as a pirate captain, attack and crush all kind of monsters and titan bosses from your ship. Your boat is the battle camp arena.

You can play this offline free idle rpg with or without an internet connection. Play everywhere!

Features Tapping game adventure

An addictive idle clicker RPG experience. Tap the screen to defeat “waves of enemies” by sword fighting before you run out of time. The more you play the stronger you will become. Attack the monsters and kill their boss as a pirate hero

Idle RPG

Your pirate crew will continue to fight against the titan monsters even when you are not playing

Upgrade your Crew!

Upgrade your heroes and make them stronger, the game become more challenging as you progress so don’t forget to train dozens of available characters

Farm Gold

Collect the coins you get from defeating enemies, tap over them and become richer. Use those coins to upgrade your characters.

Daily Rewards

Play everyday and earn free diamonds, coins and chests.

In Tap Pirates, incremental role playing game, you will find challenges and quests. Train your crew to improve their abilities in order to make them more powerful because you’ll need their help against the titans of the sea.

Let the sword fighting games begin and crush them all! The tap tap tap will never stop!

For the Role Playing Game lovers! :)
